1.en: I published the book last summer, Pedagogy of the Bible it's called, Pedagogy of the Bible, and I'll set that in a little bit of context.
1.cn: 我去年夏天出版的这本书，叫做，我会联系一点上下文。

2.en: I've always been just a little baffled at the whole concept of app-phone cases.
2.cn: 一直以来，关于橡胶手机套的整个主意总令我有些困惑不解。

3.en: He was only a little taller than Lucy herself and carried over his head an umbrella, white with snow.
3.cn: 他只比露西高一点点，头顶上打着一把伞，白色的雪覆盖着。

0.en: Let's keep this our little secret.
0.cn: 这事就当是我们俩的小秘密。

1.cn: 小小的机智应该会很好。

2.en: Gentlemen, no doubt you heard about my little breakthrough.
2.cn: 先生们，你们一定听说了我学术上小小的突破。

3.en: The camper van is just like our little house. While we are on holiday, it is our little house.
3.cn: 这辆露营车好像我们小小的家呀。这车就是我们旅途中小小的家啊。

4.en: When your Mummies and Daddies were little, they made a time capsule, too. Yes, we did. We buried it next to a little tree.
4.cn: 在你们爸爸妈妈很小的时候。他们也做过时间胶囊。没错，我们做过。我们把它埋在一颗小树下。

5.en: This tiny seed will grow into a little apple tree, like this. Oh. And that little apple tree will grow into a big apple tree like this.
5.cn: 这里小种子会长成小小的苹果树，像这颗。然后这些小树会长高变成一颗大苹果树，就像这颗。

6.en: This tiny seed will grow into a little apple tree, like this. Oh. And that little apple tree will grow into a big apple tree like this.
6.cn: 这里小种子会长成小小的苹果树，像这颗。然后这些小树会长高变成一颗大苹果树，就像这颗。

7.en: On the command bar? On everything. And it starts with the little things.
7.cn: 在一个命令条上？在所有的东西上，但需要从小的东西开始

8.en: You got a tattoo? Maybe. But just a little one. Phoebe got the whole world.
8.cn: 你去刺青了？或许只是个小的啦，菲比刺了整个地球。

9.en: You don't need your eyes to see. And you can hear every little thing that moves.
9.cn: 想看清东西不用睁眼，你就能听见森林里每一个细小的声音。

10.en: Oh, one little piece of advice that I could give you as long as you're out here.
10.cn: 既然你来了我还想给你一条小小的建议。

11.en: Oh. George is too little to play skittles. George doesn't like being the littlest one.
11.cn: 哦！乔治太小了，不能玩九球戏。乔治不喜欢做最小的小孩。

12.en: Not even Baum or Burry thought to short the AA's. But we did. Little Brownhole Capital.
12.cn: 连鲍姆和柏利都没想过做空AA，但我们想到了，小小的棕蛋资本。

13.en: And I believe the straightest path to Superman is a pretty little road, called Lois Lane.
13.cn: 而我相信找到超人的直线，是条非常小的路，叫露易丝·莱恩。

14.en: And this luggage is for one night stay? Oh yes, that is why I only pack a little bag. Oh.
14.cn: 你不是只在我们家里住一个晚上吗？噢，是的，所以我这次才带了这么小的一个行李箱过来。

15.en: When you were little, we moved into this house. We brought all our things on top of our car.
15.cn: 当你们还很小的时候，我们搬进这个房子。我们把所有东西装在汽车顶上运过来的。

16.en: At Alibaba, we fight for the little guy, the small businessmen and women and their customers.
16.cn: 在阿里巴巴，我们为一些小的生意人，和他们的客户在不懈努力。

17.en: Everybody knows that. Pluto's a little cutie-pie. The smallest planet with the biggest heart.
17.cn: 大家都知道这一点。冥王星就是个小可爱。虽是最小的行星，却有着最大的一颗心。

18.en: What's that? It is a wild animal. Oh. It is a tiny little bird. Come to look at Petro's tent.
18.cn: 这是什么声音呢？一定是野兽要来了！啊啊！哦！只是一只小小的鸟飞来参观佩德罗的帐篷。

19.en: I mean, look at these kids. They look like little nazi robots. That one's got a briefcase. I…
19.cn: 看看这些孩子，他们就像小小的纳粹机器人。那小孩还拎了个公文包。我说…
